price: 4. Ceux qui commettent les œuvres impies s’imaginent donc pouvoir Nous distancer?[392] Combien mauvais est leur jugement !
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسۡبِقُونَاۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ
footnotes: [392] C’est-à-dire, pour Nous prendre de vitesse et échapper à Notre châtiment.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-sayiāti an yasbiqūnā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
